title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\InspectConfig\FindingLimits\InfoTypeLimit
name: InfoTypeLimit
description:
Max findings configuration per infoType, per content item or long running DlpJob.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.InspectConfig.FindingLimits.InfoTypeLimit

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.info_type
params.description: Type of information the findings limit applies to. Only one limit per info_type should be provided. If InfoTypeLimit does not have an info_type, the DLP API applies the limit against all info_types that are found but not specified in another InfoTypeLimit.

params.name: data.max_findings
params.description: Max findings limit for the given infoType.

methods.description:
